post.author: Admin
post.title: Senior Band Night Donation Requests
post.description:
Hi Freshman Band Families,
On Friday, October 17, we will be honoring the senior band members. Dinn
post.content:
Hi Freshman Band Families,

On Friday, October 17, we will be honoring the senior band members. Dinner for them and their immediate family will be served at 5:30, right after practice and before the game. The rest of the band will enjoy pizza, bakery and beverages.

We are asking all Freshman Band Families to bring a store bought dessert with NO peanuts to this event. Please send your dessert with your band student and have them drop it off in Cafeteria 2 before they go to practice. Please put your last name on the dessert. No dessert should be dropped off in the band room. Someone will be in Cafeteria 2 before practice to take the dessert.

If you have any questions, please contact me at 440-864-6543.

Thank you for your support and Go Bears!

Regards,
Amanda Kost
Hospitality Chair

Hi Junior Band Families,

On Friday, October 17, we will be honoring the senior band members. Dinner for them and their immediate family will be served at 5:30, right after practice and before the game. The rest of the band will enjoy pizza, bakery and beverages.

We are asking all Junior Band Families to bring beverages to this event.

LAST NAME - A - K — Please send 1 case of water with your band student and have them drop it off in Cafeteria 2 before they go to practice or you can drop it off at my place of business by the front door Monday thru Thursday 8:00am - 7:30pm.

LAST NAME - M - Z — Please send 2 or 3 — 2 liter bottles of soft drinks (Sprite, Mountain Dew or Pepsi). Please send in the soft drinks with your band student and have them drop it off in Cafeteria 2 before they go to practice or you can drop it off at my place of business by the front door Monday thru Thursday 8:00am - 7:30pm.

My business address is Balanced Fitness, 6418 Royalton Road directly BEHIND Key Bank.

Please put your last name on the case of water and/or the soft drinks so I know who dropped off the beverages.

No beverages should be dropped off in the band room. Someone will be in Cafeteria 2 before practice to accept your donation.

If you have any questions, please contact me at 440-864-6543.

Thank you for your support and Go Bears!

Regards,
Amanda Kost
Hospitality Chair
